metadata.title: CVE-2009-3582 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in the delete subroutine inSQL-Ledger 2.8.24 allow remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQLcommands via the (1) id and possibly (2) db parameters in a Delete actionto the output of a Vendors>Reports>Search search operation.

criterions.comment: sql-ledger: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
